## taylor <a href='https://github.com/wjakethompson/taylor'><img src='featured-hex.png' align="right" height="200" alt='Hex logo for the taylor package. It features an abstract version of the 1989 (Taylor's Version) album cover.'/></a>

taylor is an *R* package developed to be a comprehensive resource for data on Taylor Swift songs.
Data is included for  all officially released studio albums, extended plays (EPs), and individual singles. Data comes from 'Genius' (lyrics) and 'Spotify' (song characteristics).
Additional functions are included for easily creating data visualizations with color palettes inspired by Taylor Swift's album covers.
